p: As observed in Fig. 4, the bacterial number and fluorescence intensity of the essential oil-treated S. yphimurium and S. aureus cells increased dramatically with incubation time and concentrations of essential oil. Taken together, these results confirmed the inhibiting capacity of essential oil on the growth rate of surviving S. yphimurium and S. aureus, and also suggested that incubation time and concentration presented significant inhibitory effects on the growth of tested bacterial strains.
